title: Breakfast Islands, Designer Flooring, Gas Appliances, Peloton Machine
map_address: 615 Healdsburg Avenue near 615 Healdsburg Ave  & Mendocino Ave
posting_body: Use the link below for more details:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 783 Sq.
Set in the vibrant downtown area of Santa Rosa, California, Six1Five is modern metropolitan living at its best.
Providing a host of conveniences, We have everything you need to live the lifestyle you want.
Six 1 Five is perfectly nestled in the heart of Sonoma County wine country, with its majestic woodlands, lush vineyards, and stunningly beautiful Russian River.
The great year-round climate is perfect for the many festivals and events devoted to food, art, and music.
We are pet friendly plus have an assortment of quality retailers and dozens of restaurants nearby.
Santa Rosa's best nightlife and shopping are yours to experience, anytime.

In addition to the friendly, helpful staff, the amenities of Six 1 Five include concierge service, a modern 1,000-square-foot fitness center to include Synergy Equipment and Peloton Bike, dry saunas, business center, and relaxing interior courtyard.
Six 1 Five is superlative living in Santa Rosa.
